name: Hiding in Plain Sight (sarahno, shudsky, noess)
name_original: Hiding in Plain Sight (sarahno, shudsky, noess)
description:
You play as a villain masquerading as the hero, trying to solve the mysterious disappearance of Winnie.

Piece together who is the girl you are looking for within the dialogue and the objects you find. Taking notes is encouraged! 

Made for the wonderful Gamerella Jam 2022 with the theme Masquerade <3

*Unfortunately, the items are simply just blank blocks for the time being. We want to make the game look better in the future!

Credits:

Sarah - Concept / Programming / Narrative&Level Design/ 3D Art

Siovan - Programming/Narrative Design

Dan - Music/sound effects

Juliana - Concept Art and in spirit <3

Wallpaper & Furniture were free assets!

Thank you !
